DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate long-term safety efficacy dutogliptin patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Dutogliptin Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Receiving Background Treatment With Glimepiride Alone Combination With Metformin With Pioglitazone Alone
